__e: The event begins on the 25th of May. Wish us luck, we’re going to need it.
See you at the park. Wish me luck.
It's only natural that you wish he were here instead of me.
Perhaps there is something she would like me to do for her.
Don't leave the house tonight unless you want the police at your door.
But that is what is so wonderful to me, that he should have everything, everything a woman could want, and he wants me.
